# [Interview #1120: Brandon Sanderson RAFOlympics at JordanCon 8, Entry #40](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1120#40)

#### Question

Did the Dawnchant originate on Roshar?

#### Brandon Sanderson

The Dawnchant...um...yes. Yes. The Dawnchant...what I wonâ€™t tell you or not is whether the Dawnchant is an evolution from a different language, but the Dawnchant itself is from Roshar.
